document.full_text: stoke routed bolton 5-0 sunday to reach the fa cup final for the first time in the team's 148-year history. this was the biggest victory in an fa cup semifinal since 1939 when wolverhampton beat grimsby by the same score.
document.title: stoke crushes bolton 5-0 to reach 1st fa cup final
lines_and_colors: stoke routed bolton 5-0 sunday to reach the fa cup final for the first time in the team's 148-year history. this was the biggest victory in an fa cup semifinal since 1939 when wolverhampton beat grimsby by the same score.
